title: Dashboard
description: A control panel which lets you create,manage,and modify your website content.

title: NoticeBoard
description: Schedule or Instantly update notices on website also from your smartphone.

title: Polls & Opinions
description: Create Polls & Surveys and analyze because every voice matters.

title: Events And Calendar
description: Upload year round Events and Holidays.

title: Multimedia
description: All your organization’s media beautifully organized at one place.

title: Online Class & Meeting
description: Schedule video conferencing details on the platform.

title: Discussion Forum
description: Discuss, share and help each other.

title: Admins
description: Create multiple administrators for your website with different user privileges.

title: Apply To This College
description: Let interested students apply to your institution for further education.

title: Ask A Question
description: Let’s anyone ask questions to the administration anonymously
